explanations: I chose this theta because the number of sheep has decreased significantly, making hunting less rewarding. With more wolves around, a lower intensity will help me conserve energy while still participating in hunts, allowing me to adapt to the changing environment and ensure my survival.

I chose this theta because the sheep population has decreased significantly, indicating that hunting may be more challenging. By increasing my hunting intensity to 0.40, I can improve my chances of catching prey while still conserving energy and avoiding overexertion, which is crucial given the declining wolf population.

I chose this theta because the decrease in both sheep and wolves indicates a competitive environment. By increasing my hunting intensity to 0.60, I can better secure food while still conserving energy, as hunting at maximum intensity may lead to overexertion and risk of injury. This balance helps ensure my survival in a dwindling population of prey.

I chose this theta because the sheep population has increased slightly, and the number of wolves has decreased. This suggests that hunting at a lower intensity may allow me to conserve energy while still being able to catch enough prey. A theta of 0.45 balances the need to hunt effectively without overexerting myself in a competitive environment.
vocalizations: Growwllllllll... the hunt is tough, but I will be clever!
Growwwwwl... the hunt is tough, but I will adapt!
Growwwwwwwl... times are tough, but I will adapt!
